[R Grade set option]

Our blacksmith guild endows R-grade armor with a set option or changes the existing set option of R-grade armor at a low price on behalf of you.
You can endow R-grade armor with a set effect.
When wearing multiple pieces of armor with the same set effect, you may receive various abilities.
If you don't like the option which has been already endowed, we will change it at any time.
Please trust in our blacksmiths. They will serve you with all their hearts.
